description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Platformer meets vertical shoot-em-up in this retro genre mashup! Fight off alien hordes who are out to protect the valuable space gems you are rightfully trying to steal! 7 Levels of action plus challenging accomplishments to shoot for!
description.short: Platformer meets vertical shoot-em-up in this retro genre mashup! Fight off alien hordes who are out to protect the valuable space gems you are rightfully trying to steal! 7 Levels of action plus challenging accomplishments to shoot for!
